verses.roman:
rāmacandra-purī tabe upadeśe tāṅre
śiṣya hañā guruke kahe, bhaya nāhi kare

synonyms: rāmacandra-purī—Rāmacandra Purī; tabe—then; upadeśe tāṅre—instructed him; śiṣya hañā—being a disciple; guruke kahe—said to his spiritual master; bhaya nāhi kare—without fear.
translation: Then Rāmacandra Purī was so foolish that he fearlessly dared to instruct his spiritual master.
